<title level="1" right="Trait">[Fungus](/Traits.aspx?ID=614)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 456 <sup>2.0</sup>

Fungal creatures have the fungus trait. They are distinct from normal fungi.
name: Fungus
